metadata.title: CVE-2024-42097 linux-6.1
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  ALSA: emux: improve patch ioctl data validation  In load_data(), make the validation of and skipping over the main info block match that in load_guspatch().  In load_guspatch(), add checking that the specified patch length matches the actually supplied data, like load_data() already did.
